bill_title: reduce the sales and use tax on food.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to reduce the sales and use tax on food. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 10-45 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: There is imposed a tax of two percent upon the gross receipts from the sale of food, as defined by the Food Stamp Act of 1977 (P.L. 95-113), codified at 7 U.S.C. § 2012(g), as amended through January 1, 2001. Section 2. That chapter 10-46 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: There is imposed a tax of two percent upon the gross receipts from the sale of food, as defined by the Food Stamp Act of 1977 (P.L. 95-113), codified at 7 U.S.C. § 2012(g), as amended through January 1, 2001. 450 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
